comments.body: For the sake of readability, it might have been better to prefix the existing variable names with underscores here rather than replace them completely. Let's consider this next time we do something similar.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +64,68 @@  [(1, "bb"), (3, "aa")] === toList (merge (\_ v -> if v <= "bb" then Some v else None) (\_ v -> Some v) (\_ _ _ -> None) m1 M.empty)
  [(1, "a"), (3, "b")] === toList (merge (\_ v -> Some v) (\_ v -> if v <= "bb" then Some v else None) (\_ _ _ -> None) M.empty m2)
  [(1,"bb"), (2,"dd"), (3,"aa")] === toList (merge (\_ _ -> None) (\_ _ -> None) (\_ v _ -> Some v) m1 m2)
